CLIENT.description: Slack client id. Get one here https://api.slack.com/apps

SECRET.description: Slack client secret. Get one here https://api.slack.com/apps

VERIFICATION.description: Slack verification token. Get one here https://api.slack.com/apps

KITSU_CLIENT.description: Kitsu client id. Kitsu doesn't have client registration yet, so just use the default for now.

KITSU_SECRET.description: Kitsu client secret. Kitsu doesn't have client registration yet, so just use the default for now.

NO_DEPRECATION.description: Disables a deprecation warning in the logs

DATABASE_URL.description: Postgres url. Don't set to use the provisioned Postgres

REDIS_URL.description: Redis url. Don't set to use the provisioned Redis

RATELIMIT_DURATION.description: Duration in milliseconds over which to apply ratelimit

RATELIMIT_MAX.description: Number of allowed requests over duration
